data.message: Facebook HELP!!!!!!! i have stopped getting notifications on time..I have opted to get notified by certain pages when something is posted, i usually get them the second it is posted until two days ago it stopped. Its either an hr late or i don't get them at all...WHY ??

replies.message: Hey Reneé. You can use your notifications settings to pick the kinds of notifications you get from Facebook. To learn how to adjust your notification settings, please visit our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/130626213681765. If you adjust your notification settings and you're still experiencing this issue, please let us know here: https://www.facebook.com/help/contact/269067606491964 Thanks! -Hailey
